data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Santos have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 10, Internacional drives forward and Edenilson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Santos a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Paolo Guerrero (Internacional) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Santos at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 12, Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Santos have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Internacional's Patrick misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 17, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Santos throw-in in Internacional's half.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 18, Santos's Felipe Jonatan attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Santos make their first substitution with Kaio Jorge replacing Luiz Felipe.
In the minute 19, Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Santos.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Santos.
Throw-in Santos.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Free kick Santos.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 24, Internacional drive upfield and Edenilson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Santos defender.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Patrick gets his shot on target but fails to score for Internacional.
Internacional's Rodrigo Lindoso breaks free at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Internacional drive forward but Paolo Guerrero is judged offside.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 30, Internacional's Edenilson goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 33, Important block from the Santos defence as Edenilson fires in a strike for Internacional.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 35, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vladimir is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 37, Vladimir is back on the pitch.
Patrick (Internacional) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Internacional.
In the minute 42, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Internacional's area.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique blows against Santos's Yeferson Soteldo for offside.
In the minute 44, Internacional's Edenilson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Santos a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Santos in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 45, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
At Estadio Beira-Rio the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In Porto Alegre, Lucas Verissimo (Santos) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
The first-half is over at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Santos are coming forward and Marinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
The away team replace Carlos Sanchez with Jobson.
Tailson is replacing Diego Pituca for Santos at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Paolo Guerrero for Internacional drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 50, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Santos have a goal kick.
Internacional surge into the attack at Estadio Beira-Rio but Paolo Guerreroâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Santos at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In Porto Alegre Santos drive forward through Marinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Edenilson (Internacional) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! A Paolo Guerrero header gives Internacional a 1-0 lead in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 57, Renzo Saravia with an assist there.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 61, Internacional are pushing forward but Edenilson's finish is wide of the goal.
Santos have a goal kick.
Thiago Galhardo of Internacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Paolo Guerrero of Internacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Santos at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Alison with Ivonei. This is the fourth substitution made today by Cuca.
Cuca (Santos) is making a fifth substitution, with Madson replacing Felipe Jonatan.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Internacional are coming forward and Thiago Galhardo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 69, Santos have a goal kick.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Santos will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Internacional.
In Porto Alegre, Gabriel Boschilia of Internacional is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick Internacional.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Internacional!
In the minute 74, Lucas Verissimo (Santos) has received a yellow card from Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
In Porto Alegre Internacional attack through Moises. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 76, Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Santos a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Santos to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 79, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Moises is booked for the home team.
Kaio Jorge (Santos) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Damian Musto is on a sub for Thiago Galhardo for Internacional.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Internacional.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Santos.
Marinho (Santos) gets a yellow card.
Internacional pushes forward through Edenilson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 84, Paolo Guerrero for the home team is judged to be offside.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Internacional throw-in in Santos's half.
Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
In the minute 85, Internacional's Gabriel Boschilia is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Santos.
Marcos Guilherme is replacing Gabriel Boschilia for the home team.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Internacional.
Internacional take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Edenilson.
Great play from Paolo Guerrero to set up the goal.
In the minute 89, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Santos's Lucas Verissimo is whistled for offside at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Santos to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
Internacional make their third substitution with Andres D'Alessandro replacing Edenilson.
